sentences: Artisti esiintyy joka kesä tässä festivaalilla.
Musiikkitapahtumaan on vapaa pääsy, ja monet tunnetut artistit esiintyvät.
context: The Finnish verb 'esiintyä' means to appear, perform, or present oneself in public. It's commonly used when referring to people performing on stage (musicians, actors, speakers) or appearing publicly in some capacity. The word can be conjugated into different forms such as esiinnytän (I appear/perform), esiinnymme (we appear/perform), and esiintyvät (they appear/perform).
